A story published Saturday said Daniels would be the odds-on favorite for the GOP nomination in 2012 if pundits, conservative columnists and political thinkers represented the party's base. The diminutive Hoosier has nurtured a profile as a mature politician whose outlook extends beyond the next news cycle and whose demeanor exudes seriousness, the story said. Simon Cowell . The 50-year-old actress- who plays scathing cheerleading coach Sue Sylvester on the US TV show- believes there are many similarities between the teacher and the straight-talking talent show judge. She said: If ever there was a guy who tells it like it is, then it's Simon Cowell . You could definitely look at Sue and say there's a lot of Simon Cowell in her. "He's a great inspiration for the character of Sue- there is a lot that I can take from him and put into her.
